Class ReturnSection<T>

java.lang.Object
io.github.syst3ms.skriptparser.lang.Statement
io.github.syst3ms.skriptparser.lang.CodeSection
io.github.syst3ms.skriptparser.lang.lambda.ArgumentSection
io.github.syst3ms.skriptparser.lang.lambda.ReturnSection<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the return value.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Finishing, SyntaxElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
SecFilter, SecFlatMap, SecMap
public abstract class ReturnSection<T> extends ArgumentSection
An ArgumentSection that can hold information about valued returned by the code inside it (typically through EffReturn).

  • Method Details

    • getReturned

      public Optional<T[]> getReturned()
      The values being returned from inside this section.
      Returns:
      an Optional describing the returned values, or an empty Optional if no values have been returned so far.

    • setReturned

      public void setReturned(Object[] returned)
      Sets the values returned from inside this section.
      Parameters:
      returned - the returned values
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - if the values passed aren't of the type T

    • getReturnType

      public abstract Class<? extends T> getReturnType()
      Returns:
      the Class of the values that should be returned from inside this section

    • isSingle

      public abstract boolean isSingle()
      Returns:
      the number of values that should be returned from inside this section
